Package org.ldaptive.schema

Class AbstractRegexDefinitionFunction<T extends SchemaElement<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.ldaptive.schema.AbstractRegexDefinitionFunction<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of schema element
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefinitionFunction<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeType.RegexDefinitionFunction, DITContentRule.RegexDefinitionFunction, DITStructureRule.RegexDefinitionFunction, MatchingRule.RegexDefinitionFunction, MatchingRuleUse.RegexDefinitionFunction, NameForm.RegexDefinitionFunction, ObjectClass.RegexDefinitionFunction, Syntax.RegexDefinitionFunction
public abstract class AbstractRegexDefinitionFunction<T extends SchemaElement<?>> extends Object implements DefinitionFunction<T>
Base class for regex definition functions.
